FROM voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_beat_info b JOIN voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_tasks t ON t.task_id = b.task_id JOIN voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_promotion p ON p.promotion_id = t.promotion_id LEFT JOIN voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_promotion_model m ON m.promotion_id = p.promotion_id AND b.num_iid = m.num_iid LEFT JOIN voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_promotion_code c ON c.promotion_id = p.promotion_id AND c.product_code = b.product_code WHERE ( p.is_active = 1 AND #{now} > t.activity_start AND #{now} < t.activity_end AND b.syn_flag = #{upFlag} ) OR ( b.syn_flag = #{revertFlag} ) OR ( b.syn_flag = #{downFlag} AND #{now} > t.activity_end ) LIMIT #{limit}
